Day 5 — RAG Matching + Deployment

Goal: Make it demo-ready.

Backend:

Finalize /internship/match API — uses resume embeddings to recommend internships.

Test full RAG flow.

Frontend:

Create a “Recommended Internships” page showing results from /internship/match.

Add minimal dashboard navigation (Sidebar, Header).

Add success/error toasts (using React Hot Toast or Snackbar).

Deployment:

Deploy Backend → Render / Railway / Fly.io / Vercel (FastAPI supported)

Deploy Frontend → Vercel or Netlify

Set proper CORS origins & environment variables.

✅ Deliverable:

Fully functional demo deployed end-to-end.

Working matching, upload, and authentication.
